attributes.action: to stop using taxpayers money to bail out banks, unless and until the bankers are brought to account for the disaster which they have heaped upon the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bankers have patently failed in their jobs and yet seem to think that they should be immune from the effects of their actions, still take their huge salaries and bonuses, thereby effectively getting reward for failure. Since the public are now majority shareholders in many banks they should be given a chance to vote on the suitability of directors and their inappropriate salaries.  These people are enormously greedy and have their snouts in the trough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
